Author: ttaimi
Text: THIS IS ME 100% OMG. and those days when I don't give a fuck I often tell myself "I'm not gonna gain weight because I only 1lbs of food in total, meaning I cannot gain over 1lbs and its not that bad" and other stuff and then step on the scale and regret all my life desicions

Author: sunfloras
Text: i do this too, actually currently in a fuck it mood, sometimes if i go a long time with restricting something in my mind just snaps and i eat whatever i want for a day. i think it’s okay, after i eat what i want i’m not lightheaded or on the verge of passing out, and my stomach doesn’t feel like there’s a painful hole in it, and i use the energy to be productive, like today i cleaned up my room, ran errands and went to class! :)
